title: [Melgorehn's Valley, Grasslands]
description: The rustle of grass off to your left causes you to start.  There does not seem to be anything there, but the eerie feeling does not leave.  To the south, a tree stands by itself in the plain, casting a deeper shadow on the moon-silvered grasses which break around it like waves against a lifeless and rocky island.
The rustle of grass off to your left causes you to start.  There does not seem to be anything there, but the eerie feeling does not leave.  To the south, a tree stands by itself in the plain.
